availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Archibald B. McGuire (Proctor store clerk and Owsley County Court Clerk)

body.p: Proctor, Kentucky store clerk and Owsley County Court Clerk. Kentucky native. Owsley County Court Clerk from 1864 to 1865.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 305. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, Proctor, p. 82. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Eighth Congressional District, 1863, p. 231. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lee County, Proctor, p. 3. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1865 (Frankfort, KY: George D. Prentice, 1866), p. 12.
